title: Fix MonthTabs horizontal scrolling to access all months (Jan–Dec)

requirements.text: Update the month selector in `frontend/src/components/MonthTabs.tsx` so users can horizontally scroll to reach all months (January–December), including months before May, on both desktop (mouse/trackpad) and mobile (touch swipe).

quotes: I can’t scroll to the months before May as shown in the image attached. Can you make it so I can scroll through all months?

acceptanceCriteria: On a narrow viewport, the month tabs row is horizontally scrollable and allows reaching January–April and November–December.
Horizontal scrolling works via touch swipe on mobile devices and via trackpad/mouse wheel/drag on desktop.
Scrolling is not blocked by a parent element; the month tabs container provides the horizontal overflow region.

requirements.text: Ensure the month selector allows partial month visibility while scrolling (i.e., tabs can be partially visible at the left/right edges), rather than forcing full-tab snapping or fitting all tabs into the available width.

quotes: Do you want the scroll bar to show partial months (like April in your screenshot), or should all month tabs be fully visible as you scroll?

acceptanceCriteria: While scrolling the month tab strip, tabs can be partially visible at the edges (no forced snapping to whole tabs).
Tabs do not wrap to multiple lines; the row remains a single horizontal strip.

requirements.text: Keep the default visible/selected month as the current month on initial load, and ensure the selected month tab is brought into view within the scrollable month selector if it would otherwise be off-screen.

quotes: Should the default visible month remain the current month, or change to something else?

acceptanceCriteria: On initial load, the selected month remains the current month (existing behavior preserved).
If the selected month tab is not fully visible, the month selector auto-scrolls so the selected tab is visible without requiring manual scrolling.

requirements.text: Add/extend frontend tests to cover the month selector scrollability regression (months before May must remain reachable).

quotes: Can you make it so I can scroll through all months?

acceptanceCriteria: At least one automated test asserts the MonthTabs renders all 12 month triggers and the container is configured for horizontal overflow (e.g., via classnames/attributes expected by the implementation).
Tests fail if MonthTabs is changed in a way that removes horizontal scrolling or wraps tabs.

constraints: Do not modify files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only Shadcn components); compose them from app components instead.
Keep all changes within the existing React + TypeScript + Tailwind stack; no new frameworks.
Backend changes are not required for this fix; do not alter Motoko state or APIs.
nonGoals: Redesigning the dashboard layout beyond the month tab scrolling behavior.
Changing how months/years are calculated or fetched in the backend.
Adding new calendar features (year switching, date pickers, etc.).
